Lyric:
[by:王彼此_BeI]
[00:20.79]I've been trap inside my head
[00:22.90]Feeling like there's nothing left
[00:25.34]The silence, takes over
[00:30.04]Holding on to my regrets
[00:32.50]Choking down a cigaret
[00:34.98]The ending, gets closer
[00:39.32]Pressure is building
[00:41.50]The struggle begin
[00:43.87]Break, break from the dark
[00:47.42]Free from the shadows
[00:49.84]All of this pain is left me now
[00:53.46]It rapes me apart
[00:56.97]To suffer in silence
[00:59.35]Escaping the monster I've become
[01:11.43]
[01:15.98]I just need some piece of mine
[01:18.35]All the scars are reason why
[01:20.82]My heart is so empty
[01:25.34]Try to leave it all behind
[01:27.74]Find a way to make it right
[01:30.20]I'm looking but can't see
[01:34.65]Pressure is building
[01:36.76]The struggle begin
[01:39.14]Break, break from the dark
[01:42.72]Free from the shadows
[01:45.15]All of this pain is left me now
[01:49.94]It rapes me apart
[01:52.32]To suffer in silence
[01:54.80]Escaping the monster I've become
[02:00.11]
[02:29.49]Break, break from the dark
[02:33.15]Free from the shadows
[02:35.78]All of this pain is left me now
[02:40.26]It rapes me apart
[02:42.65]To suffer in silence
[02:45.16]Escaping the monster I've become
[02:50.23]Break from the dark
[02:52.68]Free from the shadows
[02:55.17]All of this pain is left me now
[02:59.56]It rapes me apart
[03:02.01]To suffer in silence
[03:04.54]Escaping the monster I've become
[03:11.59]
[03:16.49]Escaping the monster I've become
[03:27.07]Escaping the monster I've become
[03:31.86]
